Her name was Jakelin Amei Rosmery Caal Maquin. She was 7-years-old and died in CBP custody of dehydration and exhaustion. News reports suggest she had to wait 90 minutes before receiving emergency medical care. We need answers and we need them now. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DueJS1HWsAE6k2f.jpg

In many places across the country, today is the last day to sign up for health insurance under the Affordable Care Act. (Californians, remember that you have until January 15 to sign up.) Be sure to visit http://Healthcare.gov today & #GetCovered.

Millions of Americans are living in this fear today because of the relentless Republican assaults.

Make no mistake -- we can lay this absurd case and its absurd ruling at the feet of the GOP. We have to be just as relentless in our fight to #ProtectOurCare. Join us.
Imagine you're the parent of a child with diabetes or asthma. Without the ACA, will your insurance company drop your child? Raise your out-of-pocket costs? Can you afford insulin without insurance?

Imagine you're someone with cancer. You'd been denied insurance before, or charged extraordinary premiums for care that literally keeps you alive. In the past few years, you've finally been able to afford treatments and medication because of the ACA.
Today, millions of Americans woke up this morning to headlines like this -- Republican "Judge In Texas Rules Against Obamacare"
Throughout the campaign, Trump and Republicans lied about protecting people's pre-existing conditions -- all the while pushing a lawsuit to have the ACA declared unconstitutional.

Make no mistake: Republicans are responsible for the Affordable Care Act being declared unconstitutional by a Texas judge. 19 GOP Attorneys General and Trump’s White House support the lawsuit. Now tens of millions of people’s health care is at-risk. That’s the truth.

Heartbroken for this child & her family. Heartbroken that this is happening in the United States of America. Every person should be treated with dignity & compassion, no matter which side of the border they come from.
